## Constitution Compliance Verification

- [ ] CHK001 Verify responses are grounded only in book content with retrieval-augmented generation (Accuracy principle)
- [ ] CHK002 Confirm design prioritizes learning journey of AI/robotics students at various skill levels (User-centric principle)
- [ ] CHK003 Validate system demonstrates reliability for ROS 2, Gazebo, Isaac Sim, and other book topics (Reliability principle)
- [ ] CHK004 Confirm no user queries are stored or logged, maintaining stateless conversations (Privacy principle)
- [ ] CHK005 Verify architecture leverages free-tier services within resource constraints (Scalability principle)
- [ ] CHK006 Confirm implementation uses specified tech stack (OpenAI Agents/ChatKit, FastAPI, Neon, Qdrant) (Tech consistency principle)

## Privacy & Security

- [ ] CHK012 Verify no persistent storage of user questions or interactions
- [ ] CHK013 Confirm all conversations are stateless

## Performance & Scalability
